question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. e. Brothers of Italy-National Alliance (FdI-AN)
raw_output:
I have a somewhat favorable opinion of Brothers of Italy-National Alliance because they are a significant right-wing party in Italy that has gained substantial political influence in recent years. Their policies and rhetoric resonate with voters who favor nationalism, sovereignty, and conservative social values, though opinions about their approach can vary widely depending on political perspectives. Considering this, I would select a moderate positive rating. 

ANSWER: B
